sentences.en: An apple tree producing square fruit is baffling experts.
sentences.cn: 一棵结方形苹果的树令专家大惑不解。

sentences.en: Anti - interference is a baffling problem of communication circuit breaker.
sentences.cn: 抗干扰 一直是可通信断路器的难题.

sentences.en: His baffling questions snarled me up.
sentences.cn: 他那些莫名其妙的问题把我搞糊涂了.

sentences.en: I was constantly ill, with a baffling array of symptoms.
sentences.cn: 我一直病着，出现了一系列让人不解的症状。

sentences.en: It involves all the baffling intricacies of human liberty.
sentences.cn: 它包括人的各种自由间令人困惑的复杂关系.

sentences.en: It is quite baffling that he left without a word.
sentences.cn: 他一声不吭就走了,真叫人莫名其妙.

sentences.en: It leaves us with a dualism of properties, or qualities , that is just as baffling.
sentences.cn: 在特征和性质方面仍存在二元论,也同样令人迷惑不解.

sentences.en: The air over the world's oceans has proved baffling to many land - based air forces.
sentences.cn: 世界上的海空却是许多岸基航空部队无法逾越的一道屏障.

sentences.en: The eyes themselves were of that baffling protean gray which is never twice the same.
sentences.cn: 眸子是变幻莫测的灰色,时时在变化.

sentences.en: The glass eye, the tree, and the extreme temperatures are all baffling.
sentences.cn: 但那个玻璃眼 、 神树, 还有极端的高温都令人摸不着头脑.

sentences.en: The role of sadness was particularly baffling, he says.
sentences.cn: 他表示,悲伤的作用尤其令人困惑.

sentences.en: Their intrusion, though baffling and terrible , is not a random mischance.
sentences.cn: 他们的闯入, 虽然使人惊疑不定,却并不是飞来横祸.

sentences.en: There was no barrier between his eyes and hers now, no baffling remoteness.
sentences.cn: 现在他们的两双眼睛之间毫无隔阂, 毫无疏远困惑的迹象了.

sentences.en: They succeeded in baffling the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他们成功地阻击了敌人.

sentences.en: To the outsider the prosperity of Northern Ireland is baffling.
sentences.cn: 对于外人来说,北爱尔兰的繁荣令人难以理解.

words.tran_cn: 使…困惑；使…受挫折；用挡板控制
令人困惑的；阻碍的；令人丧气的；变幻的

trans.tran_cn: 令人困惑的，难对付的，难解的
使困难，使为难( baffle的现在分词 )
